name: reelrave-server-side
description: The Reel Rave backend API is a powerful, yet easy-to-use solution for powering the Reel Rave movie review app. Built with Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB, this API provides a robust set of RESTful endpoints for managing and manipulating movie reviews, ratings, and user information. It is designed to be highly scalable and can handle a large number of requests and users. The API uses JSON Web Tokens for secure authentication and authorization, ensuring that all communications between the app and the API are protected. This package can be easily installed via npm and is designed to work seamlessly with the Reel Rave front-end app, making it an ideal choice for developers looking to build a feature-rich movie review app.
author: murad muqbel
